query.searchScript:
SELECT u.REAL_NAME as name,j.JOB_CODE FROM sctrans.SYS_USER_ORG_JOB uj LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_job j on uj.JOB_ID=j.ID LEFT JOIN sctrans.sys_user u on uj.user_ID=u.ID
j.JOB_CODE='YCCWREVIEW' AND uj.IS_DELETED='0'

select o.id,o.org_name as name from sctrans.sys_org o
inner JOIN sctrans.T_TS_TEAM_PROPERTY t on o.org_code=t.YU_TEAM_CODE
o.is_deleted=0
and o.PARENT_ID=#{parentId}
and o.ORG_NAME like '%贵宾服务部%'
and t.TEAM_PROPERTY ='yu_front'
and t.TEAM_PROPERTY !='yu_front'

with o as( select p.id,p.parent_id from sctrans.sys_org p where p.id =#{orgId} and p.is_deleted=0 union all select c.id,c.parent_id from o inner join sctrans.sys_org c on c.parent_id = o.id and c.is_deleted=0 )
SELECT uoj.user_id,uoj.org_id, org.org_name,uoj.job_code,uoj.job_name,uoj.real_name FROM sctrans.v_user_org_job uoj INNER join sctrans.sys_org org on uoj.org_id=org.id
ismain=1 and is_leader=1
and uoj.job_code =#{jobCode}
and exists(select 1 from o where uoj.org_id = o.id)
